justification_for_role_creation:
Hiring un-paid intern for Roposo engineering team for 2 months.  11th Jun to 11th August.
Project Scope - For Q3, there is going to more focus on getting the right UX for users across Glance and Roposo, we will have Live buzz, make Vibes experience work for Glance audience, and changes in the Explore screen. All of this will involved multiple parallel tracks with focus on User experience. The intern will be involved in solving for some of the things, working with a mentor in the team and tagging along for on-call issues.

legal_entity: India - Inmobi Technology Services Private Limited
justification_for_role_creation:
Corp IT Dedicated Network engineer position is open since the old engineer Prem moved to Info Sec team on inmobi payroll. This is a level 1/2 network position.
Network Engineer Job Responsibilities:
	Establishes and maintains network performance.
	Builds net configurations and connections.
	Troubleshoots network problems.
	IP address auditing.
	Firewall
	Establishes networking environment by designing system configuration and directing system installation.
	Defines, documents, and enforces system standards.
	Maximizes performance by troubleshooting network problems and outages and scheduling upgrades.
	Configures router.
	Updates data servers and network equipment.
	Collaborates with network architects on network optimization.
	Secures network system by establishing and enforcing policies and defining and monitoring access.

Network Engineer Qualifications/Skills:
	Network knowledge
	Network design and implementation
	Network troubleshooting
	Project management
	Problem solving and analytical skills
	Time-management skills
	Strong documentation skills
	LAN knowledge
	Network hardware configuration
	Network performance tuning
	Firewall knowledge

legal_entity: India - Inmobi Technology Services Private Limited
justification_for_role_creation:
Existing A/V and TechStop engineer has put down his paper. We need to hire his replacement.

Roles 
	Technical Skills
	Proficient in Microsoft Teams.
	Creating a channel for Team discussion
	Adding apps on MS Team
	Scheduling Audio/ Video calls as per client requirements.
	Adding Q&A polls for attendees for the sessions
	Broadcasting live events for Internal Meetings
	Experience on telecommunication equipment's- POLYCOM series endpoints
	Worked on telecom protocols - H.323/SIP
	Actively involved in the VC project includes Analyzing, Deployment and Implementation of the VC Endpoints
	Experience on VC Network monitoring tools

Responsibilities
	Provides support for AV -Infrastructure - Project and Operation
	Support collaborative team in providing good User Experience of VC facilities in all locations
	Maintaining Entry and Exit Formalities in the Customer side for the Newly Joined VC Engineers
	Ensuring operational readiness of VC systems - Performing regular checks and ensuring preventive maintenance of VC sub systems
	Attending to complaints raised due to problems in VC systems (first level user support)
	Support for Web Streaming, Skype for business collaboration platform call support
	Providing End user training on the usage of VC facilities
	Plan & Support room take care in setting up VC connectivity during high profile / senior management / customer meetings (managed VC services)
	Collection of User feedback, categorizing, analyzing and taking measures
	Generation of monthly reports & Metrics like VC usage statistics, User feedback
	Responsible for the higher end collaboration rooms, Board rooms, VC rooms, Tele presence rooms, & Town halls.
	Acting as Eyes and hands support for centralized VC & Telepresence teams to resolve the local issues
	Ensure the health condition of all the equipments, Escalate the issues to the client when problem persists
	Site local point for all the collaboration tools like Video conference, Telepresence, Live meeting & Communicator conference (Round Table)
	Manage the booking of the Higher end collaboration rooms based on the user request
	Provide trainings to the customers about traditional room-based collaboration and web-based conferences.
	Collecting requirements from customer and planning large events like
	Town halls, Webcast live streaming
	Co-ordinate with multiple vendors for new projects, AMC and Breakdown visit
	Co-ordinate with the IT local s from all over the world to make the events successful
	Monitoring the VC call flow in monitoring tools for the important meeting
	Trouble shooting conference phones
	Managing endpoints license

justification_for_role_creation:
As our Admin associate, Dewi, is proceeding on maternity leave, we are currently seeking an intern Admin associate to fill the position for a duration of 6 months.

here is the JD:

	Coordinate office activities and operations to secure efficiency and compliance to company policies
	Ensure rent/Maintenance/ all the office utility bills are paid on time and account maintained on a regular basis.
	Maintain a safe, comfortable and clean environment for InMobi and Glance employees in Jakarta.
	Ensure employees are provided with food( breakfast/lunch). 
	Organize cultural activities in the office to keep employee engaged from time to time.
	Assist employees for business travel bookings like hotel, Cab service etc. when needed/requested.
	Be available to support in an emergency situation irrespective of time/ day 
	Maintain in order essential equipment like medical First Aid kit, fire extinguishers etc.
	Organize Deep cleaning, Pest Control, Fumigation etc with the frequency provided by central/HQ team.
	Celebrate regional / international events in office with an approval from head of Administration.
	Update employees about region holidays over emails to plan the work. 
	Stay updated about lease agreements/ contracts.
	Maintain a standard vendors / service provider contact details for office operations.
	Maintain compliance as per the company guidelines and local regional standards. 
	Maintain monthly office expense report and ensure expenses are covered as per the approved budget. 
	Main Covid protocols in office and ensure we keep updating employees as per local guidelines.
	Maintain agreements for all engaged vendors. 
	Maintain basic stock up stationery, Pantry edibles in the office. 
	Ensure our Branding/logos are maintain well within the premises. 
	Ensure pantry eatables are available for the employees like Coffee Machine, Pantry snacks , Drinking Water etc. 
	Coordination with HR team to new joiners welcome kit prepare and required support in induction. 
	Coordination with HR & IT team for laptop delivery for new joiners. 
	Coordination with HR team to block meeting rooms for inductions. 
	Coordination with HR & IT team to collect company asset from exit employees.

Cc: Surekha Gubbi Nagaraj <surekha.nagaraj@glance.com>; Marita Natasha Dsantos <marita.dsantos@glance.com>; Manasa Deshpande <manasa.deshpande@glance.com>; Rohit Dangi <rohit.dangi@glance.com>; Arundhati Ganesan <arundhati.ganesan@inmobi.com>
Subject: Third Party Consultants- KAM Bulk Hiring

 

Hi All,

 

This is in regards to the third party consultants were planning to hire in Nipuns org as Consultant- KAM through LNM Technologies (Kaamkaaj).

 

As you all must be aware that all our recruitment process is now captured on Greenhouse i.e requisition creation, interview, offer and closure.

 

Given for this project the number of positions are a bit high (may go upto 50+ as well in the upcoming quarter(s)), we wanted to streamline the recruitment process for these hires for easier execution and faster TAT.

Below are the steps for everyones reference and alignment :

 

Raising the requisition : Nipun to raise the requisition on Greenhouse. We already have 21 approved requisitions. This needs to be an ongoing process wherein we would need HRBP and BU head approval on Greenhouse to proceed.
As aligned, this is a 6 months contract to start off with and can be extended basis business needs.

 

Offer Approval : Currently as a process, after a candidate gets identified, we take 3 layers of approval to roll out an offer.
However given this is a bulk hiring, weve taken an exception to treat this mail as a blanket approval to roll out offers for any immediate or future hires ONLY for this project. Currently, weve 11-12 candidates who can join us by next Monday.

Hence requesting @Ankit  @Atoshee  @Nipun @Mansi to revert on this mail so that we dont have to take multiple offer approvals for each hire through Greenhouse and we can roll out offers basis this blanket approval.

Weve spoken to Nipun and agreed that the budget for a single resource will be b/w 2.5-3.5 lacs per annum.

              Pls note : Before making any offer, Vendor will be sharing the current, offered CTC, DOJ of the candidate to the Hiring manager, recruiter and HRBP for confirmation.

 

Offer Closure- Recruiter to mention the CTC offered and upload blanket approval mail screenshot for each candidate on greenhouse for future tracking and audit purpose.
 

Onboarding- @Vishal As discussed, we would want these folks to have company email ID and other few basic mail/teams/MS access hence need your help in intimating the IT and L&D team likewise.
                        Recruitment team will help you with Aadhar card and other offer details as per the process aligned offline.

 

@Hanumegowda- Trust this looks good to proceed from a process perspective. Pls do highlight if otherwise.

 

Thanks

Sherin

justification_for_role_creation: As part of Project Symphony, we need to raise a PO for each of the expense items. Currently we dont have a PO process and we issue PO only when some vendors ask for it. Based on the current timeline, PR to PO automation is coming to lice anytime in July now and we may have to raise the PO for all the expense items starting July. Currently, As Sathish will move away, we have only Seema as Lead in the function and considering the transactions volume, we need at least one more person at junior/fresher level (Associate level) to manage the operational work in the PR to PO process & also perform transactional work for routine activity of Consumables buying as well as prepare documentation.

legal_entity: India - Inmobi Technology Services Private Limited
justification_for_role_creation:
There is a need for  an additional headcount for our billing team. Billing workload has increased significantly, especially during our migration to MSD.  We have to rely on single resource due  and  we do not have any backup resources to rely on, which has put a strain on our team's ability to meet deadlines and deliver high-quality work.

To ensure that we have adequate resources to maintain our service levels, I am requesting an additional headcount for the billing team.

legal_entity: India - Inmobi Technology Services Private Limited
justification_for_role_creation:
Building Salesforce L1 Support team to support wide Salesforce issues for our Sales users

A dedicated Salesforce L1 Support Team will significantly improve our ability to provide prompt and efficient support to our sales. By addressing their issues and inquiries more quickly, we can enhance customer satisfaction and maintain positive relationships with our clients.

A specialized L1 Support Team can efficiently triage and resolve common issues, allowing our more experienced support staff to focus on more complex problems. 

A dedicated L1 team can serve as the front line for documenting and addressing frequently asked questions and issues. This data can be used to create a comprehensive knowledge base, which not only benefits our customers but also serves as a valuable resource for our entire organization.

The establishment of our Salesforce L1 Support Team is a strategic move that aligns with our commitment to customer satisfaction, efficiency, and long-term growth. It will empower us to provide top-notch support, streamline our support processes, and contribute to the ongoing success of our Salesforce operations.

legal_entity: India - Inmobi Technology Services Private Limited
justification_for_role_creation:
We need an intern to support the InMobi Legal team with the following activities:

1.	Assist in drafting, reviewing, and editing a variety of legal documents, including MSAs, IOs, and NDAs.
2.	Ensure that contracts are compliant with relevant laws and regulations.
3.	Assist in developing and maintaining a contract management system to track and monitor contract status and renewals.
4.	Assist in reviewing and revising existing contracts to ensure compliance with legal and regulatory standards.
5.	Assist in the preparation of presentations, reports, and other materials as required.
6.	Conduct legal research on assigned topics.
7.	Draft & assist in designing standard contract templates with different versions to accommodate varying business scenarios.
8.	Analyses contractual obligations and makes recommendations on proposals, contract language and terms, conditions, and assumptions.

Required skills from candidates:

(a)	In-depth knowledge of legal concepts, contractual terms, and constructs.
(b)	Detail-oriented, passionate about learning and research.
(c)	Exceptional written and oral communication skills.
(d)	Strong interpersonal skills and a high degree of awareness to be able to face internal stakeholders.
(e)	Good analytical and comprehension skills.
(f)	Research capability is a must.
(g)	Proficiency in using MS Office.

legal_entity: India - Inmobi Technology Services Private Limited
justification_for_role_creation:
Building Salesforce L1 Support team to support wide Salesforce issues for our Sales users

A dedicated Salesforce L1 Support Team will significantly improve our ability to provide prompt and efficient support to our sales. By addressing their issues and inquiries more quickly, we can enhance customer satisfaction and maintain positive relationships with our clients.

A specialized L1 Support Team can efficiently triage and resolve common issues, allowing our more experienced support staff to focus on more complex problems. 

A dedicated L1 team can serve as the front line for documenting and addressing frequently asked questions and issues. This data can be used to create a comprehensive knowledge base, which not only benefits our customers but also serves as a valuable resource for our entire organization.

The establishment of our Salesforce L1 Support Team is a strategic move that aligns with our commitment to customer satisfaction, efficiency, and long-term growth. It will empower us to provide top-notch support, streamline our support processes, and contribute to the ongoing success of our Salesforce operations.

legal_entity: India - Inmobi Technology Services Private Limited
justification_for_role_creation:
Building Salesforce L1 Support team to support wide Salesforce users/issues

A dedicated Salesforce L1 Support Team will significantly improve our ability to provide prompt and efficient support to our sales. By addressing their issues and inquiries more quickly, we can enhance customer satisfaction and maintain positive relationships with our clients.

A specialized L1 Support Team can efficiently triage and resolve common issues, allowing our more experienced support staff to focus on more complex problems. This division of labor will streamline issue resolution and reduce response times.

A dedicated L1 team can serve as the front line for documenting and addressing frequently asked questions and issues. This data can be used to create a comprehensive knowledge base, which not only benefits our customers but also serves as a valuable resource for our entire organization.

The establishment of our Salesforce L1 Support Team is a strategic move that aligns with our commitment to customer satisfaction, efficiency, and long-term growth. It will empower us to provide top-notch support, streamline our support processes, and contribute to the ongoing success of our Salesforce operations.

legal_entity: India - Glance Digital Experience Private Limited
justification_for_role_creation: In-app pod manages the monetization(programmatic & non-programmatic) execution on all in-app properties of glance. This track has been slow last year but were picking up rapid pace on this track with the enablement of programmatic ads on highlights and spaces. Athul is leading this pod and currently running execution on integration for Highlights(X, R), Hub, Spaces, Folders, 1W along with the build out of Blend as the ads sdk. The pod is also expected to match the pace on broader programmatic themes such as header bidding, connecting to IX, connection to direct demand. With active first time integrations, it becomes challenging for Athul to manage the operational overhead of managing integrations with surfaces; continuing to build out blend & plan ahead for features and keeping up to speed with overall programmatic improvements. In-app currently manages ~$50k of glance revenue and this is expected to scale far beyond web revenues. Strategically, In-app inventory in Spaces and Highlights is expected to be our primary inventory source and consequently, in-app monetization is expected to scale far more than web monetization. We need to provide appropriate support to Athul to ensure we can continue to scale in-app monetization at the requisite rapid pace.

job_title: Partner Manager:  Data, Identity, and Addressability
justification_for_role_creation:
Chris / Aakanxa,
 
Over a series of communications threads, it has become abundantly clear that we have need for a dedicated partner manager to oversee ongoing day-to-day relationships and optimize our engagement with the growing list of partners across the identity, audience and attribution space. We already have a meaningful list of existing partners, with a slew of potential partners on the horizon:
 
Current:
Identity Infrastructure: LiveRamp, ID5, Experian (TapAd), TrueData
Universal ID Vendors: LiveRamp, ID5, Trade Desk, LiveIntent
3P Audience Data: LiveRamp, Eyeota, InMarket, Veraset, TrueData, Infutor
Location attribution: InMarket, Foursquare, Cuebiq
 
Evaluation:
Identity infrastructure: TransUnion, Acxiom, Adstra, Audience Acuity, Roq.ad, ZeoTap, 33Across, TruthSet
Universal ID Vendors: Lotame (Panorama ID), Criteo
Agency IDs: Publicis (Epsilon Core ID), Dentsu (Merkle1 ID), IPG / Kinesso, WPP (Choreograph)
Clean rooms: Optable, Habu, Infosum, LiveRamp, Karlsgate
 
That is only to mention those with which we have active discussion threads. There are myriad other prospective partners not mentioned, as well as additional partnerships that could fall under this bucket, including audience extension platforms (e.g., Audigent, arcSpan, Semcasting, Salesforce, Oracle, and others).
 
Today, we manage some of these under the IX Ecosystem Partnerships team, but their bandwidth is already over-extended. Moreover, the scope of many of these partnerships extends well beyond IX, and we have generally agreed that those partners whose applicability extends to the overall IDI infrastructure, iDSP, and Glance should fall under separate purview. Ongoing partnership management is taking up an increasing portion of time from Brian, myself, and folks on Prajwals team, and we need support to free up bandwidth to pursue the next tranche of partnerships.
 
We did not have this role on our initial hiring plans for 2023, but the need has become manifest over the past few months, and I am hoping you can help me to initiate the process to get approval to hire for this role. I am open to staffing it either externally or through an internal transfer through the LEAP program, if we have qualified internal folks with meaningful prior partnership management experience. The role should ideally be located in the US, either NYC or SF, but we could consider London for a really ideal candidate.

Creation of a new Program Manager role for Identity team. This will be replacing an '23 AOP Investment Ask for a Data Scientist - Client Solutions role. The increased cost has been approved by Abhay. We have an internal candidate that has been identified and will move into this role.

job_title: Sales Head, Microsoft Advertising - Beijing, China
legal_entity: China - InMobi Technology Information (Shanghai) Co. Ltd
justification_for_role_creation:
1. Responsible for new customer development and maintenance of major clients, possessing a certain amount of customer resources, deeply exploring customer needs, and promoting deep cooperation among industry clients.
2. Analyze the advantages and disadvantages of internal and external products, integrate resources across departments, and lead the team to submit professional integrated marketing service plans to customers.
3. Implement the company's sales policies, develop, and implement sales plans, and lead the team to achieve sales targets.
4. Analyze customer needs and market status, summarize market and industry characteristics, and provide decision support for product and process optimization and business expansion
5.Responsible for agent development, agent management, and agent performance completion.
6.Implement company channel policies and develop specific management measures for agents.
7.Understand the actual operation situation of agents, formulate, and implement targeted operational development strategies, and enhance the sales and refined operation capabilities of agents.

legal_entity: China - InMobi Technology Information (Shanghai) Co. Ltd
justification_for_role_creation:
The external translator requested by Group HQ Project Symphony is to help translate Project Symphony system, SalesForce system etc. contents from English to Chinese language). This request has been agreed with Group HQ VP Finance Rajesh Agarwal, Sales Operations Lead (Abhijith Achuthakumar), FP&A Manager (Arkadeep Paul Choudhury). The translator cost will be sponsored by Group HQ. 
The charges of the external translator  sourced by our China Legal Dept. LilyTao Feng is as follow (Vendor Name: Global Tone Communication Technology Co., Ltd.): 
1. Translation rate for text versions: [240] yuan/thousand characters;From English to Chinese
2. Translation rate for website localization: [300] yuan/thousand characters;From English to Chinese
3. Rate for QA: [150] yuan/hour.(Chinese version)

legal_entity: China - InMobi Technology Information (Shanghai) Co. Ltd
justification_for_role_creation:
With regard to Dean Zhang position (IM2161), our China Management Team (Country GM Charlie, HR, Finance and Legal) have agreed to convert Dean from FTE to consultant starting from May 23rd, 2023 until Aug 10th, 2023 (Dean planned last working day as employee with InMobi will be on May 22nd, 2023). The transitional period (convert Dean Zhang from FTE to Consultant) is required because we will need some time to find replacement and time for handover.

From procedure wise, we have obtained our Group HQ VP Finance (Rajesh Agarwal) formal approval on this request. As  Rajesh is out of office for two weeks (from this Monday 15th May 2023 onwards, might not have access to internet), we have obtained Rajesh email approval.

There is also need a step up our efforts in international markets, especially in the US where we are in the process of launching Glance. All these have put tremendous pressure on the existing members of the PR team to manage multiple things at the same time.

justification_for_role_creation: Glance is looking for an Office/ Studio Manager in Indonesia. Studio Managers are able to work in multiple industries and settings such as music, graphic design or television studios. They often have prior experience in fields such as communication, music production, engineering or broadcasting. Due to the varied settings in which a Studio Manager may work, their job duties may vary. However, the general requirements of the job are to be able to supervise a staff and oversee the daily operations of the studio.

Glance is looking for a passionate Creator Partnership Manger can take ownership and empower a portfolio of top content creators by building active and strong relationships. Drive product adoption and provide ongoing education about new and existing Glance products. Analyse, interpret and translate key quantitative metrics and business trends into tailored strategic insights that drive content creators account satisfaction, growth and retention. Develop innovative and high impact partnership directly with creators, as well as to their respective agencies and management companies

Glance Indonesia is now having 20 million monthly active users with propositions of LIVE content streaming & LIVE gaming streaming. We work with leading publishers, creators, and game streamers in Indonesia to serve personalized content across categories of Entertainment, Sports, Gaming and News.

Glance Indonesia is now having 20 million monthly active users with propositions of LIVE content streaming & LIVE gaming streaming. We work with leading publishers, creators, and game streamers in Indonesia to serve personalized content across categories of Entertainment, Sports, Gaming and News.

justification_for_role_creation:
Job Description Part1: 50% of this Job
1. Contribute to increasing brand advertising revenue and building and delivering integrated marketing methodologies, creating industry-leading benchmark partnership cases.
2. Conduct customer marketing strategy research, develop integrated marketing solutions, plan projects, and create IP. Cultivate marketing methodology accumulation.
3. Provide professional optimization suggestions and reports, as well as daily work such as problem diagnosis for clients.
Job Description Part2: 40% of this Job
1. Be responsible for Microsoft's business analysis and business insights.
2. Assist the finance team in building the Bing China data platform.
3. Be responsible for Bing China's weekly/monthly/quarterly performance tracking, business report construction, and data presentation.
Job Description Part3: 10% of this Job
1. Be responsible for English business translation in the Bing team.
2. Accept the Bing team's assigned translation tasks, communicate closely with users, external system suppliers, and internal development teams, and prepare relevant demand documents and user manuals.
3. Participate in project meetings held within the Bing team.

legal_entity: India - Glance Digital Experience Private Limited
justification_for_role_creation:
We are looking for senior analyst/Analyst to join our efforts in programmatic monetization of Pinsightmedia, Hub and Folder properties. The role would involve deep diving into complex data sets to identify actionable insights that drive day to day business decisions. Drive revenue reporting and tracking, data analytics and develop insights into supply needs, pricing optimization and undertake product/ tech liaising exercises. 

Revenue Optimization and Profit Maximization: Specialize in analyzing our existing revenue streams, identifying areas of improvement, and implementing effective strategies to optimize revenue and maximize profits. 
Data Analysis and Insights: Heavily rely on data analysis and insights to drive informed decision-making, leverage advanced analytics tools and platforms to evaluate customer behavior, identify patterns, and uncover opportunities for revenue growth. Through data-driven strategies and continuous monitoring, the analyst would ensure that our monetization efforts are agile, insightful and adaptive.

legal_entity: India - Glance Digital Experience Private Limited
justification_for_role_creation:
Current Programmatic Business needs technical programmatic knowledge alongside deep analytical mindset to handle queries across stakeholders (OEM, Publisher, Product Managers, and even sometimes DSP for integrations).

Justification for the role : 
1. Focus on Revenue Optimization - Primarily responsible for pricing optimizing and identifying opportunities for growth
2. Collaboration with Cross-Functional Teams : Effective monetization strategies require close collaboration across different departments, including but not limited to teams across partnership , content-ops, product , and finance
3. Defined Responsibilities :  Analyzing revenue data, developing monetization strategies, implementing pricing models, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and monitoring key performance indicators (KPIs), helping ad integrations
4. Career Advancement and Employee Development: Senior Associate will primarily look into a specific region or category of the business. Being the business owner, he/she will do everything to grow the business for that segment

Overall, the role will have a diversified portfolio& all aspects to grow exceptionally in next few months/ years, helping the overall business to grow.

legal_entity: India - Inmobi Technology Services Private Limited
justification_for_role_creation:
One of our key resources, Sahana, has resigned from her role as an SDE1 in the Corp IT team. She was responsible for day-to-day operations and maintenance of various IT systems and applications that support the core functions of our organization. Her departure leaves a critical gap in our team that needs to be filled urgently.
We request to upgrade the vacant position to an SDE2 role code, as we need a senior resource who can handle more complex and challenging projects that require advanced technical skills and domain knowledge. The SDE2 role will also entail leading and mentoring junior resources, ensuring quality standards and best practices, and collaborating with other teams and stakeholders across the organization.
We also remind that our previous request to backfill an SDE3 (Vijayanand J) resource, who left the team last year, was put on hold/Cancelled. This has resulted in increased workload and pressure on our existing team members, who have been juggling multiple tasks and responsibilities with limited resources and support. The lack of sufficient senior resources has also affected our ability to innovate and deliver new solutions that meet the evolving needs and expectations of our customers and partners.
It is imperative that we hire an SDE2 resource as soon as possible to support our critical projects and operations. Without this resource, we will face the following risks and impacts:
- Delayed or compromised delivery of project milestones and deliverables, which could affect our reputation, customer satisfaction, and revenue generation.
	
- Increased operational issues and incidents, which could disrupt our business continuity, productivity, and performance.
- Reduced morale and motivation among our team members, who could experience burnout, stress, and dissatisfaction due to excessive workload and unrealistic expectations.
- Loss of competitive edge and market share, as we will lag behind our peers and competitors in terms of innovation, efficiency, and quality.
We appreciate your consideration and approval of this request. Please let us know if you have any questions or concerns. Thank you.

justification_for_role_creation:
-Currently, Stef manages all the internal cross-team (GTM/Delivery/Sales/Sales Engineering) collaborations and external agency communications as needed
-With Stef leaving, Vindy's responsibilities will expand to overseeing all cross-team collaborations, necessitating an L2 resource to support her workload
-L2 resource is crucial in Jakarta due to the market's requirement for local context expertise in building creatives and connecting with sales/ agency from ad unit creation perspective. Additionally, we need someone to serve as backup for days when Vindy is on planned or sick leaves
-From a revenue perspective, last quarter business team clocked $0.5 million, and we're targeting similar figures for Q2. Overall, from an AOP standpoint, sales is looking at $3 million or more for the year. Therefore, an L2 creative resource is necessary to handle all briefs/ agency servicing, considering our typical conversion is in the range 20-25% from pitch to closure stage

legal_entity: India - Inmobi Technology Services Private Limited
justification_for_role_creation:
Given the current Regulatory landscape, it has become necessary to have a Nodal officer to liaise with regulatory bodies. 
We are looking for a highly motivated professional for the role of Nodal Contact Person for InMobi in India. 
	This person is needed to coordinate with law enforcement agencies in India, including facilitating timely responses to valid legal requests under applicable law and our policies. 
	This person shall also oversee the Companys acknowledgement, redressal and response to user complaints and grievances. 
	The ideal candidate will be an experienced professional with significant prior experience in working with and/or within law enforcement agencies and managing user grievance programs. This person would be passionate about Inmobi Glance, Roposo and familiar with our product ecosystem.
	This is an important and standard industry practice for risk mitigation and regulatory compliance. In our interactions with both the key ministries it came out very strongly that such a person/ team is needed and there is a crucial gap within the existing legal team. 
	This role will manage, and resolve all LEA requests, collect on ground intelligence, and build capacity within LEAs to understand and appreciate our business platforms. Thereby ensuring minimal escalations or management time.
The role will report into Legal with a dotted line reporting to Public Policy (Dr. Subi Chaturvedi).
